categories.name: Design of Experiments
categories.description: To design a task that studies the relationship between input and output variables

templates.name: Overview
templates.description: Overview board for design of experiments templates
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=doe_overview

templates.name: Bayesian Optimization
templates.description: To optimize the parameters using a bayesian model
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_optimization

templates.name: Bayesian Modelling
templates.description: To estimate the parameters by modelling parametrized equations
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_modelling

templates.name: Classical Doe
templates.description: To estimate the parameters if all trials have to be run in parallel
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=classical_doe

categories.name: Hypothesis Testing
categories.description: To infer if the data at hand supports a certain hypothesis

templates.name: Overview
templates.description: Overview board for hypothesis testing templates
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/hypothesis_testing --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=hypothesis_testing_overview

templates.name: Classical Hypothesis Testing
templates.description: To use statistical tests to infer if the data supports a certain hypothesis
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/hypothesis_testing --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=classical_ht

templates.name: Causal Hypothesis Testing
templates.description: To model good fitting causal structures and obtain causal estimates
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/hypothesis_testing --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=causal

templates.name: Equation Hypothesis Testing
templates.description: To test if a hypothesis in the form of an equation fits the data well
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/hypothesis_testing --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=equation

categories.name: Outlier Detection
categories.description: To detect outliers in labelled and unlabelled datasets

templates.name: Overview
templates.description: Overview board for outlier detection templates
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=outlier_detection_overview

templates.name: Autoencoder
templates.description: To detect outliers by training an autoencoder on clean data and finding poorly reconstructed data
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=autoencoder

templates.name: Bayesian Supervised
templates.description: To train a Bayesian model on labelled outliers and use it to predict outliers in new data
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_supervised

templates.name: Bayesian Unsupervised
templates.description: To detect unlabelled outliers using a Bayesian model
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_unsupervised

templates.name: Supervised
templates.description: To detect outliers by training models on labelled outliers and use them to predict outliers in new data
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=supervised

templates.name: Unsupervised
templates.description: To detect unlabelled outliers through clustering algorithms
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/outlier_detection --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=unsupervised
